name: UClothingSimulationInteractor
doc:
If a clothing simulation is able to be interacted with at runtime then a derived
interactor should be created, and at least the basic API implemented for that
simulation.
Only write to the simulation and context during the call to Sync, as that is
guaranteed to be a safe place to access this data.

methods.name: ClothConfigUpdated
methods.doc: Called to update the cloth config without restarting the simulation.

methods.name: DisableGravityOverride
methods.doc: Disable any currently set gravity override.

methods.name: EnableGravityOverride
methods.doc: Set a new gravity override and enable the override.

methods.name: GetClothingInteractor
methods.doc: Return a cloth interactor for this simulation.

methods.name: GetNumCloths
methods.doc: Return the number of cloths run by the simulation.

methods.name: GetNumDynamicParticles
methods.doc: Return the number of dynamic (simulated) particles.

methods.name: GetNumIterations
methods.doc:
Return the solver number of iterations.
This could be different from the number set if the simulation hasn't updated yet.

methods.name: GetNumKinematicParticles
methods.doc: Return the number of kinematic (animated) particles.

methods.name: GetNumSubsteps
methods.doc:
Return the solver number of subdivisions./
This could be different from the number set if the simulation hasn't updated yet.

methods.name: GetSimulationTime
methods.doc: Return the instant average simulation time in ms.

methods.name: PhysicsAssetUpdated
methods.doc: Called to update collision status without restarting the simulation.

methods.name: SetAnimDriveSpringStiffness
methods.doc: Set the stiffness of the spring force for the animation drive.

methods.name: SetMaxNumIterations
methods.doc: Set the maximum number of solver iterations.

methods.name: SetNumIterations
methods.doc: Set the number of time dependent solver iterations.

methods.name: SetNumSubsteps
methods.doc: Set the number of substeps or subdivisions.
